title: Scorned Seconds
description: In the second book of the Rebel Third series, the Third rebellion continues. Thirds from all over the Ten Colonies gather in Erroris to train and plan in order to overthrow the Doctors, and Cameron (an eager leader) readily seizes command.Not everyone agrees with his methods, however, and an important question remains Can you build a better world on the bones of murder?With this question in mind, Seconds and Thirds must unite to topple the oligarchy that plagues their land--slaves working alongside former masters as discord smolders from within.
author: Jillian Torassa
